DarkMouse::
She jumped and rolled out of the fire ball's way.  But the heat was 
strong.  Her skin felt warm.  She fired again at the dragon. "You 
silly lizzard. Don't you know we are on the same side you heap of 
flying scrap. You should be shooting that bad breath of yours at the 
kitty and not me. But oh well, have it your way." as she fired again, 
aiming at the dragon's belly with a stun shot. If nothing else, it 
will stun the dragon long enough for her to run out of fire shot. 

Panzer::
Still out cold was grabbed by the other dragon. 




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> lUZBEL/Attilla::
> 
> Barely the males avoided the shots and Luzbel said to 
> Attilla "Attilla, destroy that pest!!!"
> 
> "Why me??"protested the male "I'm not in Pest-control-area"
> 
> "'cause I commanded you, I'm your old brother"
> 
> "You're lieing, Luzbel, Shivah is our old brother"
> 
> "But I'm oldest than you"Replied Luzbel while he came in in the 
ring 
> of fire.
> 
> "You heard it Mikey mouse's sister"said Attilla to Dark-mouse "Get 
> lost or you will be roasted"
> 
> After that Attilla transformed to his Beast mode (A dragon) and 
spat 
> fire against Dark Mouse.
> 
> While Luzbel Grabbed Panzer hand.
